about_the_game:
Potyguara Verse: Explore, Discover, and Connect in a New Virtual Universe

Potyguara Verse is an innovative virtual reality platform that blends entertainment, culture, and exploration in an interactive and immersive environment. Inspired by the beautiful city of Natal (RN), the game allows you to explore iconic tourist spots, participate in cultural events, and connect with other players—all from the comfort of your home.

Here, you don’t just play—you live a unique experience, immersing yourself in Potiguar culture in an interactive way. Discover digitally recreated historical and natural landmarks, participate in cultural events, and engage with a vibrant community. By using a virtual reality headset, you can venture through captivating environments, engaging minigames, and unique experiences.

Key Features:

🎭 Immersive Exploration: Visit Rio Grande do Norte’s most famous landmarks and discover new scenery with every visit.

🎶 Cultural Events: Participate in artistic and cultural experiences within the virtual environment.

🗣️ Social Interaction: Meet other players, make new friends, and join multiplayer events that bring people together from around the world.

🎮 Diverse Minigames: Test your skills in interactive challenges.

With Potyguara Verse, culture and entertainment are right at your fingertips, combining cutting-edge technology, interactivity, and an educational experience. No matter where you are, your adventure begins now!

content_descriptors.notes: The platform features a zombie mode set in the Fortaleza dos Reis Magos, where players must defend the location against invading zombie hordes. This mode includes firearm combat and blood effects.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10 (64-Bit)
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-4590 / AMD Ryzen 5 1500X
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GTX 1060 (6GB) / AMD RADEON RX 580
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 20 GB available space
  • Sound Card: Integrated
  • VR Support: Open XR on Meta Platforms with Meta Quest 2
  • Additional Notes: It is recommended to use SSD and at least 1 USB 3.0 port for the Headset
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 11 (64-Bit)
  • Processor: Intel i7-9700K / AMD Ryzen 7 3700X
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA RTX 2060 / AMD RX 5700 XT
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 20 GB available space
  • Sound Card: Creative Sound Blaster or ASUS Xonar
  • VR Support: Open XR on Meta Platforms with Meta Quest 2
  • Additional Notes: It is recommended to use SSD and at least 1 USB 3.0 port for the Headset
